sections.content: The children of the associated HTML element.
The class list of the associated HTML element.

code.declaration: public readonly class = 'mkdocs-ts CodeSnippetView w-100 overflow-auto mb-3'

sections.content: The style of the associated HTML element.
The tag of the associated HTML element.
Class appended to the line DOM for highlighted lines.

sections.title: Arguments
sections.content:
*  **cmConfig**: The code mirror editor configuration, it is merged with the
     [default configuration](@nav/api/MainModule/MdWidgets.CodeSnippetView.codeMirrorConfiguration)  (eventually overriding attributes).
*  **content**: The snippet's content.
*  **highlightedLines**: Highlighted lines, *e.g.*  `[5 10 20-25  28 30]`
*  **language**: The target language. Supported languages are:
     *  python
     *  javascript
     *  markdown
     *  html
     *  yaml
     *  css
     *  xml

Represents a note on the page.

This view is registered in  [GlobalMarkdownViews](@nav/api/MainModule.GlobalMarkdownViews) : it can be instantiated from Markdown using the tag
 `note` . See constructor's documentation for details regarding its parameters.
